attributes.action: Stop using the e-petitions as a mailing list data base to send Labour promotional leaflets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since signing e-petitions on this site I have been sent Labour propaganda leaflets, I have never received these before and there is no other way 'they' could have my address other than from this site. Giving my address to a petition is not meant to be used for some political mailing list and I'm sure must breach the data protection laws.
